resources.string:
StickyGridHeaders is an Open Source Android library that allows developers to easily create a GridView that shows items in sections with headers. By default the section headers stick to the top like the People app in Android 4.x but this can be toggled off. StickyGridHeaders also automatically sizes its rows to the largest item in the row.

StickyGridHeaders has been designed to be adapter compatible with, and was inspired by, StickyListHeaders.

StickyGridHeaders
